text: phir agar vahee chaahata to tum sabakee hidaayat karata (ai rasool) tum kah do ki ( achchha) apane gavaahon ko laakar haazir karo jo ye gavaahee den ki ye cheeze (jinhen tum haraam maanate ho) khuda hee ne haraam kar dee hain phir agar (bilagaraz) vah gavaahee de bhee de to (ai rasool) kaheen tum unake saath gavaahee na dena aur jin logon ne hamaaree aayaton ko jhuthalaaya aur aakhirat par eemaan nahin laate aur doosaron ko apane paravaradigaar ka ham sar banaate hai unakee nafasiyaanee khvaahishon par na chalana
